questions:
What is the photo about?
A) forest and a house
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a forested area
D) Inside a museum

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) An old wooden shed and trees
C) A body of water
D) A mountain range

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A wooden building
C) A river
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Skyscrapers
B) A dense forest
C) A beach
D) A cityscape

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A paved road
B) A grassy field
C) A sandy beach
D) A flower garden

What is the condition of the grass in the foreground?
A) Brown and dry
B) Green and well-maintained
C) Covered in snow
D) Filled with flowers

What kind of building is in the center of the photo?
A) A modern house
B) A wooden shed
C) A stone castle
D) A glass skyscraper

What is the color of the building in the center?
A) White
B) Red
C) Brown
D) Blue

What surrounds the building in the photo?
A) A fence
B) A garden
C) Open grassy area
D) Water

Is there any sign or symbol visible on the building?
A) Yes, a warning sign
B) No, there are no signs
C) Yes, a decorative symbol
D) Yes, a graffiti

What is the texture of the building's exterior?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and wooden
C) Metallic and cold
D) Soft and fabric-like

Are there any people visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many people
B) No, there are no people
C) Yes, a few people
D) Only one person

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Not visible
D) Red

Is there any water body visible in the photo?
A) Yes, a river
B) Yes, a lake
C) No, there is no water body
D) Yes, a pond

What is the shape of the building's roof?
A) Flat
B) Gabled
C) Curved
D) Dome-shaped

Are there any vehicles visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many vehicles
B) No, there are no vehicles
C) Yes, one vehicle
D) Yes, a few vehicles

What is the primary color visible in the photo?
A) Red
B) Green
C) Blue
D) Yellow

Is there any signage indicating a prohibition on the building?
A) Yes, a no parking sign
B) No, there is no signage
C) Yes, a no entry sign
D) Yes, a speed limit sign

What type of landscape surrounds the building?
A) Urban landscape
B) Mountainous landscape
C) Forested landscape
D) Coastal landscape

What is the material of the building's walls?
A) Brick
B) Wood
C) Concrete
D) Glass

Is there any indication of human activity in the photo?
A) Yes, there are people present
B) No, there is no human activity
C) Yes, there are vehicles
D) Yes, there is construction equipment

What is the dominant natural element in the background?
A) Water
B) Trees
C) Rocks
D) Sand

What is the state of the grass in the foreground?
A) Overgrown
B) Trimmed and neat
C) Patchy
D) Burnt

Are there any animals visible in the photo?
A) Yes, many animals
B) No, there are no animals
C) Yes, one animal
D) Yes, a few animals

What is the main visual contrast in the photo?
A) The building against the green grass
B) The sky against the trees
C) The people against the landscape
D) The water against the land

Is there any evidence of recent human activity in the photo?
A) Yes, footprints are visible
B) No, there is no evidence
C) Yes, there are fresh tire tracks
D) Yes, there is construction material

What is the primary texture visible in the foreground?
A) Smooth and wet
B) Rough and grassy

D) Hard and rocky

A) Red
